levels.description: Immediately searches for the lowest HP target in front of this unit and attacks <@ba.vup>{times}</> times for <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage (The last hit deals double damage as <@ba.vup>True</> damage); Each enemy defeated during these slashes will increase Amiya's ATK by <@ba.vup>+{amiya2_s_2[kill].atk:0%}</> and RES by <@ba.vup>+{amiya2_s_2[kill].magic_resistance}</>, stacking up to <@ba.vup>{amiya2_s_2[kill].max_stack_cnt}</> times; Afterwards, Amiya will deal <@ba.vup>True damage</>; <@ba.rem>This skill can only be used once per battle</>
